It's Really A Wonderful Movie With Unexpected Turns. And I Think That Manish Paul Has Did His Debut Brilliantly. You Will Be Suspensed Till The Climax Of The Movie. The Star Cast Was Also Amazing. The Movie Deserves To Earn More But The Public Has Rejected It And Made It A Flop üò†.

Never ever watch this movie if you are seeking a hacker based movie. This movie is a non-brainer. The whole movie doesn't make sense. The hacking techniques shown in the movie are horseshit. The white hat hacker in this movie is not even a nerd he is a "cool" extrovert.

This movie is just for those who has never seen a computer or else you will die laughing till the end.

Never ever watch this movie if you are seeking a hacker based movie. This movie is a non-brainer. The whole movie doesn't make sense. The hacking techniques shown in the movie are horseshit. The white hat hacker in this movie is not even a nerd he is a "cool" extrovert.

This movie is just for those who has never seen a computer or else you will die laughing till the end. 

If you think that this movie has anything to offer regarding hacking just see this movie poster and you can imagine what kind of movie it is and to whom this movie is targeted.
